definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: This is why an operating system is easier to design.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼操作系統反而比財務軟件更容易設計。

sentences.english: Skillful in use financial software and office system.
sentences.chinese: 熟練使用財務軟件和辦公軟件。
